item.title: Second-Generation p-values: Improved rigor, Reproducibility, & Transparency in Statistical Analyses
item.description: Reference Jeffrey D Blume, Lucy D’Agostino McGowan, William D Dupont, Robert A Greevy, Neil R. Smalheiser “Second-generation p-values: Improved rigor, reproducibility, & transparency in statistical analyses” (2018) // PLOS ONE. Vol. 13. No 3. Pp. e0188299.
